product_name: Sea to Summit Trek and Travel Shampoo with Conditioner - 3 fl. oz.
long_description: Whether you're traveling around the world or spending a week in the woods, the Sea To Summit Trek and Travel Pocket shampoo with conditioner helps you keep up with your hygiene. Trek and Travel Shampoo is biodegradable and phosphate free; concentrated formula only requires a cap full of shampoo for a normal wash. Shampoo has a light green tea fragrance. Suitable for both fresh and saltwater. 3 fl. oz. container is compliant with TSA carry-on luggage regulations.
short_description: Whether you're traveling around the world or spending a week in the woods, the Sea To Summit Trek and Travel Pocket shampoo with conditioner helps you keep up with your hygiene.
